scenario_text.value:
Not a lotta sunlight in these apartments, is
there?

You noticed, huh? Is it because you’re like
a plant, Floramon?

Well, I can say that I feel way better when
I can bathe my body in sunlight.

But it’s not like I’m completely made of
vegetation.

Hmm... There’s so much we don’t know about
you Kemonogami.

(There must be things they like or dislike
based on the ecosystem.)

(It seems like they didn’t know about bad
evolutions until the professor told them.)

(We clearly have a lot to learn about the
Kemonogami.)

I wish Falcomon would just come out and be
honest with his feelings.
